title: Antidote - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Psychological   Romance   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manhua   Artists   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Character Growth   Couple Growth   Family Conflict   Friendship   Gangs   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   Pets   Power Couple   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Reversible Couple   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests   Tragic Past   Younger Love Interests
author: Wu Zhe   巫哲
description: Cheng Ke quit his job, moved away from his rich family in pursuit of arts. He is a sand painter who creates stunning pieces of art using sand. He becomes Jiang Yu Duo’s tenant who’s a gang leader and takes care of his sister’s apartments. Their worlds collide as they move from mutual rejection to mutual understanding. Through hard work and struggles, they each achieve success and move towards a better future.>
